channel.title: Testscape item editing (question) - yo im new
channel.description:
i downloaded the source and blah blah blah
i need help editing the items in my inventory, after i go to charectors and changing the amount of gp i logg back in they are the same. yes i am saving it.
can someone please tell me what i am doing wrong? yeh im a noob atm starting small lol dont flame me :)

item.title: Testscape item editing (question) - yo im new
item.dc:creator: @Rum0 Rum0
item.description:
@Rum0 wrote:

You have to use client.java to edit that or if your admin you could just use the pickup code ::pickup 0995 then the amout of money you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Testscape item editing (question) - yo im new
